\"./common/foundation/mixins\";\n@import \"./common/components/buttons\";\n\narticle.post {\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;\n\n  img.avatar {\n    border-radius: 50%;\n  }\n\n  &.deleted {\n ol,\n  ul {\n    clear: none;\n  }\n\n  blockquote {\n    padding: 10px 8px 10px 13px;\n    margin: 0 0 10px 0;\n    border-left: 5px solid darken($primary-low, 5%);\n    p {\n      margin: 0 0 10px {\n    padding: 10px 5px;\n    float: left;\n\n    img {\n      max-width: 45px;\n      border-radius: 50%;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .cooked {\n    padding: 10px 0;\n    margin-left: 65px;\n    word-wrap: }\n}\n\n.username {\n  font-size: $font-down-1;\n  margin: 0 0 10px 0;\n\n  a {\n    color: #5c5c5c;\n  }\n  a.staff {\n    background-color: #ffffc2;\n  }\n\n  a.new-user {\n    color: font-size: $font-down-1;\n  text-align: center;\n  margin: 10px 20px 6px 0;\n  display: inline-block;\n  float: right;\n  color: #0088cc;\n}\n\n.replies {\n  font-size: $font-0;\n  color: display: flex;\n  flex-direction: row;\n  align-items: center;\n  justify-content: space-between;\n\n  h3 {\n    margin: 0 auto 0 0;\n    font-size: $font-0;\n  }\n}\n\n.embed-error {\n  padding: 0
